description: Denominator of mass (Sum 1/|Aut(H)|) of Hadamard matrices of order 4n.
references: V. Alvarez, J. A. Armario, M. D. Frau and F. Gudlel, The maximal determinant of cocyclic (-1, 1)-matrices over D_{2t}, Linear Algebra and its Applications, 2011, in press; doi:10.1016/j.laa.2011.05.018
links: Index entries for sequences related to Hadamard matrices~
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, E. M. Rains
